dt-example.title: Simple column visibility dropdown
dt-example.info:
ColumnControl has two content types to control column visibility: `-content colVisDropdown` and `-content colVis`. The former is simply a wrapper for the latter in a `-content dropdown` with a suitable icon and text set.
This example demonstrates the use of `-content colVisDropdown` - as you will see it creates a dropdown with a list of the columns in the table, and the end user can select which columns they wish to be visible. This is _very_ similar to [the column visibility control in Buttons](https://datatables.net/extensions/buttons/examples/column_visibility/simple.html).
